Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Agentic AI has permanently altered the way enterprises do business, improving time to value, productivity and the automation of complex workflows. However, with increased deployment of AI comes an increased need to manage and optimize siloed agents. In this demo, see how IBM Consulting is helping clients build, manage and orchestrate a team of agents that unlocks greater speed, increases productivity and maximizes ROI.
